page.title: 16ENERGY KING'S NYMPTON
page.content: All properties now have an{ELECTRICITY {supply}maintained by The South West Electricity Board. Failure in the main supply brings special problems to the farmer who has to care for animals and has a dairy herd which needs milking by electric milking machine twice a day. Many farmers have now installed a generator to use as a backup in emergencies.{CALOR GAS }Used for cooking in a few homes through housewife's preference.Cylinders of calor gas can be bought at South Molton{SOLID FUEL}Open fires and wood burning stoves are still popular. Solid fuel stoves are used for cooking and water heating .Wood is bought locally and a coal merchant delivers weekly.{OIL }Oil-fired heating is used in a few homes and the oil is stored in bulk tanks.
